MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Rodel Drive and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.59am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Rodel Drive substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.06am on 15th February 2021.
